tool_description: Your one-stop shop for all things sports. Real-time live scores, news, odds, schedules, boxscores, teams, logos, and much more across 50+ professional and collegiate sports.
name: SCORE ROOM
title: SCORE ROOM

api_list.name: fetchTodayGames
api_list.description: Get today's live and upcoming games and events, across most major sports.

api_list.name: fetchTopEvents
api_list.description: Get today's most anticipated events, across most major sports.

api_list.name: fetchBoxScore
api_list.description: Get live statistics from ongoing and finished games across most majors sports and leagues.

api_list.name: fetchPlayByPlay
api_list.description: Get up to the second play-by-play read outs across most major and minor league professional and collegiate sports.

api_list.name: fetchLeagueSchedules
api_list.description: Fetch start and end dates, times, game competitors, logos, venues, markets, broadcasts, and much more.

api_list.name: fetchConferences
api_list.description: Gets professional and collegiate conferences with their respective teams across 44 major sports and leagues.

api_list.name: fetchOdds
api_list.description: Get odds data for todays top events across all major (and some minor) sports and leagues.

api_list.name: fetchLiveScore
api_list.description: Get live up-to-the-second scores for any live or concluded games.

api_list.name: fetchTeams
api_list.description: Get professional and collegiate teams, leagues, and general team/league data across 44 major sports. (names, leagues, location, logo, etc.)

api_list.name: fetchLeagueArticles
api_list.description: Get league specific headlines and articles across 50+ major and minor sports leagues at the professional and collegiate levels.

api_list.name: fetchFeaturedArticles
api_list.description: Get featured headlines across most major professional and collegiate sports and events.
